title: Should I Join ECE in Main Campus
content: Hello I am getting ECE in Main Campus so should I join that as my only other option is CCE in Manipal main campus. The only thing that matters to me are the internships and the placements so which one do you suggest I join?

comments.body: Go ask in r/Manipal the same thing. Should I join CCE. If they say don't then come to pesu
Did you get the invitation for counselling?
what do u think abt   VIT Vellore CS  vs PES RR CS
PES RR CS for placements, vellore CS if you want a life.
wow i thot vellore was strict
Ok will do that, but i also wanted to ask if companies allowed ece students to sit in placements for cse
May i know ur rank if ya dont mind
I got 1097 in pessat so I am certain that would able to get ece in the main campus
As far as i know you will get ece , you also have chances for getting cse
Yes hopefully I get cse  but I wanted to know if taking ece would be a good option since the only other good college I have is manipal
Till what rank is ece open?
